translations: n.剩余物，残留物；（扣除应付款项、债款、遗赠后的）剩余遗产，余产

sentences.sentence: The residue of the estate was divided equally among his children.
sentences.translation: 剩余遗产被他的孩子平分了。

sentences.sentence: Always using the same shampoo means that a residue can build up on the hair.
sentences.translation: 总是用同一种洗发水意味着残留物会在头发上越积越多。

sentences.sentence: This incineration generated a large quantity of residue ash.
sentences.translation: 这次焚烧产生了大量的残灰。
